title: Ohms law - internal and external resistance

content.question: Which expression is equal to the current in the battery?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 10 delta V sub T, and denominator 21 R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mpadded><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>V</mi><mtext>T</mtext></msub></mpadded></mrow><mrow><mn>21</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 10 delta V sub T, and denominator 21 R" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>5</mn> <mpadded> <mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi> <msub> <mi>V</mi> <mtext>T</mtext> </msub> </mpadded> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>3</mn> <mi>R</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="the fraction 10 script open E over 21 R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi>Ɛ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>21</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="the fraction 5 script open E over 3 R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>Ɛ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction 10 script open E over 21 R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi>Ɛ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>21</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
